review: Nothing get close to Oatly. The only issue some people has is that if you dont like the "oaty" flavour, you won't like it. But what can i say, it's OAT milk. I love the taste of oats so i love this so much. It's the best non-dairy milk every crafted. I try to be dairy free because of chronic issues, and this helps a lot with my coffee love.
